page.title: 18A child's day,Coton Village
page.content: Life in Coton is quiet and peaceful.The weekdays are busy when we get ready for school and feed our 3 pet cats,rabbit & guinea pig.My 2 sisters and I have to be driven 2 miles to school by 8.55am. We are all home by 4pm.After school I watch television,play outside on the swing,play tennis or ride my bike.I have to do homework after tea.At week- ends I clean out the pets and tidy my room.I sometimes go into Northampton to spend my pocket money.When I have a friend to play we go to a secret place where we've built a seesaw.My sisters like to make camps and play in them.In winter we play squash a lot at East Haddon.From my bedroom I can see birds, rabbits,cows and sometimes a fox.I have a small garden to grow flowers and lett -uce,and I've made a pool for the frogs to use.Although it is quiet and there are no other children I like Coton.
